scripts.test:local: cross-env RUN_ENV=local npx cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/steps/**/*.ts --require src/support/hook.ts features
scripts.test:bs: cross-env RUN_ENV=bs npx browserstack-node-sdk cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/steps/**/*.ts --require src/support/hook.ts features
scripts.test:local-browserstack: cross-env RUN_ENV=local npx browserstack-node-sdk cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require src/steps/**/*.ts --require src/support/hook.ts features
scripts.report:allure: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
